description: Add a service type unit of measure to a job production plan.
permissions: Allowed for users authorized to access the related job production plan per JobProductionPlanServiceTypeUnitOfMeasurePolicy (delegated to job_production_plan).
side_effects: Creates a job production plan service type unit of measure; may auto-create cohort entries and enqueue background updates to time card service type unit of measures.
validation_notes: --job-production-plan and --service-type-unit-of-measure are required. step-size must be one of: no_step, ceiling, floor, standard_rounding_up. step-size defaults to no_step when not set. service-type-unit-of-measure must be unique per job-production-plan.

flags.name: --service-type-unit-of-measure
flags.description: Service type unit of measure ID

flags.name: --step-size
flags.description: Step size rule (no_step, ceiling, floor, standard_rounding_up)
flags.validation: Allowed values: no_step, ceiling, floor, standard_rounding_up
